messages.message:
Hi Brian,

I appreciate you connecting with me. I take pride in working with engineers for the past 13 years in regards to their benefits, insurance, wealth management strategies, and other financial needs. I wanted to reach out to you to learn more about you and your future financial goals while with The SOS Method Foundation. My team will be happy to review your benefits package and make sure your financial plan aligns with your future goals. Let me know if there is a convenient time to grab coffee or lunch to see if my team can be a resource towards your continued success. I look forward to it!

Best Regards,

Stacey Wisman

Stacey M. Wisman, CLU, ChFC | Financial Planner | MassMutual Arizona
17550 N. Perimeter Drive, Suite 450, Scottsdale, Arizona 85255

(Cell) 602.628.1507 | (Office) 480.538.2943 | (Fax) 480.473.2138
